adept.common

Class MentalStateMention

  • java.lang.Object
    • adept.common.Item
      • adept.common.HltContent
        • adept.common.MentalStateMention
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BeliefMention, SentimentMention

    public abstract class MentalStateMention
extends HltContent
implements Serializable
    Internal abstract class representing the commonality between SentimentMention and BeliefMention.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
